hero.tagline: Freelance Photography & Videography | Based in IKN, Indonesia

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Abdur Rokhim Al Firdzos, a freelance photographer and videographer based in IKN, Indonesia. My passion is capturing precious moments and turning them into everlasting memories through the camera lens.
about.paragraph2: With over 5 years of experience in the photography and videography industry, I have served hundreds of clients from various backgrounds. My expertise includes wedding photography, portrait sessions, commercial shoots, and cinematic videography.
about.paragraph3: My philosophy is simple: every photo tells a story, and every story is valuable. I believe that the combination of professional technique, artistic creativity, and modern AI technology can produce extraordinary visual works.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional solutions for all your photography and videography needs

reviews.name: Budi Santoso
reviews.quote: Abdur is very professional and his photos are amazing! Our wedding became so memorable thanks to his work.

reviews.name: Siti Nurhaliza
reviews.quote: Top-notch videography quality! Our corporate event was documented perfectly and cinematically.

reviews.name: Ahmad Rahman
reviews.quote: The product photos produced are very high quality. Our product sales increased after using photos from Abdur.

reviews.name: Maya Putri
reviews.quote: A fun portrait session! Abdur is very patient and knows how to make me comfortable in front of the camera.
